name: Red Cherry Berry
description: Red Cherry Berry is a 50/50 hybrid developed by Barney’s Farms, who combined the classic sativa Skunk #1 with a California indica. The result is a sweet-smelling strain with pungent notes of flowers and fruit. Red Cherry Berry has the potential to contain moderate amounts of CBD alongside its towering THC content, and the balanced head and body effects of this potent hybrid will put to rest pain, sleeplessness, and stress. Indoors, Red Cherry Berry flowers in 60 to 70 days, but growers cultivating this strain in warm outdoor climates will harvest around the end of September.
descriptionPlain: Red Cherry Berry is a 50/50 hybrid developed by Barney’s Farms, who combined the classic sativa Skunk #1 with a California indica. The result is a sweet-smelling strain with pungent notes of flowers and fruit. Red Cherry Berry has the potential to contain moderate amounts of CBD alongside its towering THC content, and the balanced head and body effects of this potent hybrid will put to rest pain, sleeplessness, and stress. Indoors, Red Cherry Berry flowers in 60 to 70 days, but growers cultivating this strain in warm outdoor climates will harvest around the end of September.

highlightedReviews.text: I combusted .3 grams of Health For Life cultivated Red Cherry Berry in a glass pipe with an iso-butane lighter. The high was slow starting at first but crept along nicely into a even high between my body and my head. Within the initial 10 minutes anxiety was washed away, I was quite relaxed and grew a smile that's stayed on my face for the past hour or so. There was moderate pain relief but the more severe, chronic pain I experience was still noticeable at a low dose. As for it's appearance,
Strong head high but also relaxes the body, kinda gives you both a indica and sativa feeling.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Pineapple Chunk, Jedi Kush, Red Cherry Berry, Jack Wreck, and Royal Kush
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
This week’s new strains are elite varieties developed by esteemed breeders in the cannabis community. From Barney’s Farm comes the sweet-tasting hybrids Pineapple Chunk and Red Cherry Berry. Cali Connection blesses us with Jedi Kush, bred from the indica alliance of Deathstar and SFV OG. Using the legendary genetics of Afghani and Skunk #1, G13 Labs created the balanced and medicinal Royal Kush. Last of all, for our sativa fans, we’ve added Jack Wreck which amps up the intensity of its Jack Herer parent.
Let us know what you think of these newcomers in a strain review!
   1. Pineapple Chunk
Characteristics of Pineapple Chunk:

Indica-leaning hybrid
Cheese and Skunk #1 crossed with Barney’s Pineapple
Breeder: Barney’s Farm
Tangy skunk, earthy cheese, and sweet pineapple aroma
Heavy full-body effects and a fast-paced head buzz
Painkilling and stress-relieving properties
Indoor flowering time of 55 days

   2. Jedi Kush
Characteristics of Jedi Kush:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between Deathstar and SFV OG
Breeder: Cali Connection
Sour skunk and tangy diesel aroma
Dreamy, euphoric, and cerebrally energizing
Good for pain, PTSD, depression, stress, headaches, and appetite loss
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

   3. Red Cherry Berry
Characteristics of Red Cherry Berry:

50/50 hybrid
Cross between Skunk #1 and Cherry Bomb Indica
Breeder: Barney’s Farm
Flowery, fruity aroma
Balanced head and body effects
Good for pain, sleeplessness, and stress
Indoor flowering time of 60 to 70 days

   4. Jack Wreck
Characteristics of Jack Wreck:

70% sativa
Cross between Jack Herer and Trainwreck
Sweet citrus aroma
Intense kick of cerebral psychoactivity
Good for daytime relief of pain, appetite loss, and inflammation

   5. Royal Kush
Characteristics of Royal Kush:

50/50 hybrid
Cross between Afghani and Skunk #1
Breeder: G13 Labs
Earthy, skunky aroma
Happy, euphoric, relaxing effects
Good for stress, pain, and nausea
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 13 weeks
